default.label: Label
default.options.0.label: Option 1
default.options.1.label: Option 2
description:
Adds a group of checkboxes for selecting independent answer options. This is useful if there are several options. You can add just one checkbox, but it's easier to use [field.checkbox](field.checkbox.md) for that.

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/AA2nEh_E3twhqK)
properties.options.description: An array of checkboxes, where `value` is the value to change, and `label` is the text near the checkbox.
properties.options.items.default.label: Option
properties.options.items.properties.hint: Text with additional information about the option.
